column3:
HSS Pain Management serves New York, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert care of Dr. Semih Gungor. Located in Manhattan's Upper East Side, this specialized practice offers patients access to advanced interventional techniques and personalized treatment plans designed to address chronic pain conditions. Dr. Gungor's approach combines cutting-edge medical technology with compassionate care to help patients regain functionality and improve their quality of life.

Dr. Semih Gungor is a highly qualified physician who is board certified in both anesthesiology and pain medicine. With his extensive training and specialized expertise, Dr. Gungor has dedicated his practice to providing timely, efficient, and thorough care for patients suffering from various pain conditions. His primary goal is to alleviate pain, enhance quality of life, and help patients achieve optimal functionality through personalized treatment plans.

Areas of Expertise

Dr. Gungor specializes in the non-surgical treatment of numerous pain conditions, including:

  • Spine-related pain problems

  • Back and neck pain

  • Cervicogenic headaches

  • Muscle and joint pain

  • Neuropathic pain

  • Extremity pain

  • RSD (Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy) or CRPS (Complex Regional Pain Syndrome)

Advanced Interventional Techniques

The practice offers state-of-the-art interventional procedures for both diagnosis and treatment of pain conditions, including:

  • Epidural injections

  • Radiofrequency ablation

  • Spinal cord stimulators

  • DRG stimulators

  • Various neuromodulation techniques

  • Minimally invasive procedures

Patient-Centered Approach

At HSS Pain Management, each patient receives individualized attention and a comprehensive evaluation to determine the most effective treatment strategy. Dr. Gungor's approach focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than simply addressing symptoms, allowing for more effective long-term pain management solutions.

Contact Information

Address: 429 E 75th St, 5th Floor, New York, NY 10021, United States

Phone: +1 332-286-4692

Website: https://www.hss.edu/physiciansgungor-semih.asp

column40:
I came to Dr. Gungor for a second opinion. As soon as explained my situation to the doctor, he knew right away. I was in pain and I needed help. He has assessed me and he has given me two rounds of steroids and he is continuing to treat me to help heal me the best that we can, this doctor is the only doctor that has ever taken the time to actually listen to me and believe me on all the pain that I'm in I recommend dr gungor 100%|I am grateful that Dr. Gungor was referred to me. From the first moment of meeting him I felt at ease because he took his time to ask the right questions, to listen, to evaluate and provide sound recommendations. He transcribed the information accurately in my chart which told me was really listening. Nothing got lost in translation. He won my confidence.  He has an excellent administrative staff in Eladia and Lillian who are timely, prompt and professional. A pleasure to work with. My experience at HSS with Dr. Gungor and the team who took care of me was a model of dignified care from the first moment of entering the unit until I left. Dr. Gungor's expertise during the procedure and his nurse Maricris Anic were really a star team against the backdrop of beautiful Latin music! I don't know every name but Gina and Deborah and everyone who touched my care including Jordan the nurse who called me the next day makes this a ten star  experience.|Where do I begin?  After finding Dr. Gungor, your search will have ended.  I have never met a more compassionate, caring, knowledgeable doctor for pain management.  My journey with Dr. Gungor began in 2013 when I had a pain that wrapped around from my back, on my side to my abdomen.  I was misdiagnosed by numerous doctors for about 3 months.  Dr. Gungor realized it was an "intercostal nerve" that was causing my pain.  I had an RFD (Radio-Frequency Denervation) and the pain has NEVER returned.  I have been treated by Dr. Gungor since then for different nerve pain, back pain and neck pain from a spine surgery I had in 2010.  His experience as an Anesthesiologist before he decided to focus mainly on pain management, is legendary.  One of the levels of my spine surgery did not fuse, but Dr. Gungor has kept me more than manageable with some neck and nerve pain instead of me agreeing to have another surgery about 2 years after the first one.  Dr. Gungor walks you through every option and procedure and literally holds your hand and makes sure you are comfortable before and during any procedure I have with him, and it has been many from RFD's, epidurals, facet joint injections and trigger injections.  Dr. Gungor's expertise is extraordinary and his bedside manner is off the charts, even to the point of him remembering everything I tell him about my family.  He always asks how they are doing as well.  I'm happy that one of the other doctors at HSS in the pain management department sent me to Dr. Gungor.   I am grateful to have Dr. Gungor guiding me on a pain-free journey!!|I have been a patient of Dr Gungor for 15 years. HSS as well as Dr Gungor truly stand out. The care and warmth displayed by everyone is undeniably the best you can ever ask for.|Dr. Gungor is an amazing doctor who deeply cares about his patients.  I've been seeing him for almost 15 years ago for neck and back injuries I received while serving overseas for the US government.  He has always taken the time to discuss my treatment options and helped me manage the pain so that I can continue serving abroad at the highest levels.  I'm so thankful for Dr. Gungor and greatly appreciate his professionalism and expertise.|If I could add stars to rate the level of consistent, quality care I've received since finding Dr. Gungor, I would gladly do so.
It's comforting to have a physician on my Care team that doesn't waiver when it comes to listening  to my concerns.  Further, Dr. Gungor addresses  each one with viable recommendations for treatment, and transparency about the potential outcomes. He is top notch, always balancing care and empathy, that puts me at ease, with my condition.
During every encounter with Dr. Gungor, and his staff, I feel "heard" as a patient.  The professionalism is unwavering and commendable. This is almost a rarity in most health care settings lately.
I would, without any reservation, recommend Dr. Gungor to anyone in need of an experienced, competent and compassionate pain expert.  He remains current with treatment options, consults as needed, with other members of a care team, and always puts the patient - first!|I have been a patient of Dr. Gungor for many years. During this time he has explored numerous procedures to ease my pain. Due to the excellent and innovative quality of his care, I am able to function very well. His approach is kind and attentive. He is supported by an equally committed staff.|I am a patient of Dr. Gungor for over 10 years and has address all my needs associated with my back and and neck pain. Dr. Gungor is by far the best Dr. I regularly see. He truly cares about my pain and listen to what I say about how I am feeling. Never rushes through my appointment and completely understanding not only my pain, but the anxiety and personal issues having chronic pain places on my mental health. He focuses on controlling my pain needs with all the newest technologies. When conducting a procedure he always makes sure I am not in pain or experiencing any unnecessary anxiety. I would highly recommend any person dealing with pain make an appointment with Dr. Gungor.

column2: NY Spine Medicine, Schottenstein Pain & Neurology
column3:
NY Spine Medicine, Schottenstein Pain & Neurology serves patients throughout New York, NY with exceptional neurological and pain management care. Located near Rockefeller Center in Manhattan's prestigious Diamond District, this premier medical practice offers specialized treatment for those suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Under the leadership of Dr. Douglas Schottenstein, a nationally recognized expert with dual board certifications in neurology and pain management, patients receive comprehensive care tailored to their specific needs.

NY Spine Medicine provides an extensive range of diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, including:

- Epidural injections

- Nerve blocks

- Joint injections

- Radiofrequency lesioning

- Discography

- Advanced surgical interventions:

- Annuloplasty

- Nucleoplasty

- Spinal cord stimulation

- Intrathecal pumps

- Kyphoplasty

Expert Care in a Convenient Location

The practice's central Manhattan location at 18 E 48th St #901, New York, NY 10017 makes it easily accessible for patients throughout the metropolitan area. The facility combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to address complex neurological and pain-related conditions.

Dr. Schottenstein's dual expertise in neurology and pain management allows for a unique, integrated approach to treatment that addresses both the symptoms and underlying causes of pain. This comprehensive methodology has established NY Spine Medicine as a leader in specialized care for spinal and neurological disorders.

For more information or to schedule a consultation, visit [www.nyspinemedicine.com](https://www.nyspinemedicine.com/) or call +1 212-750-1155.

I've been going now to see Dr. Schottenstein for several years. I have never experienced a Doctor that really cares how I'm feeling and we'll sit down with me To see what else he can do to improve the quality of my life. When I sit down and talk with Dr. Schottenstein, I feel like I'm talking to a member of my family. I've seen many doctors in my life and it's usually in and out in a few minutes and then next patient. Not Dr. Schottenstein, before you leave his office you really do feel satisfied that you answer every single question you have and that he has done everything to help you. I gave Dr Schottenstein a five star rating and if I could, I would give him a 10 star Rating.|Dr. Schottenstein is board certified in pain management and neurology. He genuinely cares about the well being of all his patients, and the care factor is a big plus for me. He is, by far, the best doctor I have ever seen. He has also, without a doubt, set the bar for patient care. I most highly recommend him. A well earned and well deserved five star doctor!|Dr Schottenstein is so pleasant and has great bedside manner. He provided me with lots of options for treatment and made sure to explain everything in a concise manner. Im currently still working with him and have faith that I will feel less pain.|Dr. Schottenstein gives good "shotts", highly recommend!!

He truly cares, actively listens and provides his patients with options & realistic expectations with a common sense approach.
He is easy to talk to, down to earth, gentle with a needle, compassionate, empathetic, and professional.

His office is patient centric, set up as a "one stop shop" for exam / in office procedure if needed. Responsive & easy to communicate with via ans service, text, email.  Typical to receive call back within a few hours.

He operates his practice in an "old school" manner, meaning it is not a  "medical mill" with patients scheduled 5 minutes apart.  He keeps your appointment time without a wait.

Arrive on time or you could be asked to reschedule, those of us with appointments after yours appreciate and respect that policy!|Dr. Schottenstein is the best, he sits down with you and answers all your questions then
he goes over all of your options with you and tells you what he recommends but lets you
decide what course of action to take with no pressure. He is patient, friendly and a great doctor that knows what he is doing, I highly recommend him.|I have been seeing Dr. Schottenstein for over 10 years.  He has helped me greatly in keeping my symptoms in check and thanks to his care I am able to live a normal life.  Words alone cannot describe how truly greatful I am to have him as my Doctor. He is the best of the best.  If you are considering epidural injections, fear not. Dr. Schottenstein is amazing at this.  He takes great care in making sure you have a pleasant and pain free experience with the added benefit of relief.|Great practice. Dr. Shotenstein is one of the best doctors I have ever seen. My pain has decreased exponentially since I started seeing him. And everything is so streamlined they make it so easy|Dr. Schottenstein has been my doctor for a few years now and I must say he is devoted to his profession and treats me as if I was the only patient he has. He's compassionate as well as professional and takes the time to listen to what I have to say and plans my treatment accordingly.

NYC Pain MD serves the Elmhurst neighborhood of Queens and the Financial District of Manhattan in New York City. This premier pain management practice brings together a team of experienced specialists dedicated to providing comprehensive care for adults suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. With a commitment to patient-centered treatment approaches, NYC Pain MD has established itself as a trusted healthcare provider for residents throughout the five boroughs seeking effective, non-surgical pain relief solutions.

At NYC Pain MD, patients receive access to full-service integrative pain management therapies. The practice specializes in treating various musculoskeletal problems, including knee pain, shoulder discomfort, hip issues, sports-related injuries, and arthritis. What sets NYC Pain MD apart is their conservative approach that prioritizes minimally invasive procedures designed to provide lasting pain relief without resorting to surgical interventions.

Patient-Centered Approach

The specialists at NYC Pain MD understand that each patient's pain experience is unique. Their treatment protocols are customized to address individual needs, combining evidence-based medical interventions with holistic care strategies. This integrative methodology ensures patients receive the most effective treatment plan for their specific condition, resulting in improved quality of life and enhanced mobility.

Convenient Locations

NYC Pain MD welcomes patients at their accessible location at 30-63 31st St, Astoria, NY 11102. The practice has become a destination for pain relief seekers from across New York City, drawing patients who value their expertise in managing complex pain conditions. For appointments or consultations, patients can call +1 718-557-9298 or visit their comprehensive website at www.newyorkcitypainmd.com to learn more about available treatment options.

NYC Herniated Disc Treatment Clinic serves patients throughout New York, NY with specialized care for spinal conditions. Located in the heart of Manhattan, our clinic combines advanced diagnostic technology with innovative treatment protocols to address herniated discs and related spinal issues. Our team of board-certified specialists has collectively treated over 5,000 patients, helping them return to pain-free, active lifestyles without always resorting to invasive surgical procedures.

At NYC Herniated Disc Treatment Clinic, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to spinal care. Our treatment options include non-surgical interventions such as targeted physical therapy, spinal decompression, regenerative medicine, and precision-guided injections. For patients with more complex conditions, we provide minimally invasive surgical options performed by our fellowship-trained surgeons who utilize the latest techniques to minimize recovery time and maximize outcomes.

Personalized Patient Care

We understand that each herniated disc case presents unique challenges. Our specialists develop customized treatment plans based on comprehensive evaluations, advanced imaging, and detailed patient histories. This personalized approach ensures that each patient receives the most appropriate and effective care for their specific condition, whether they're suffering from acute disc herniation or chronic spinal pain.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our clinic at 29 W 57th St features advanced diagnostic equipment, comfortable treatment rooms, and a dedicated physical therapy center. The convenient Midtown Manhattan location makes quality spinal care accessible to patients from all five boroughs and beyond.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our herniated disc specialists, call us at +1 917-905-6119 or visit our website at http://newyorkpaincare.com/. Our clinic is located at 29 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, with convenient access to public transportation and nearby parking options. New patients are welcome, and most major insurance plans are accepted.

University Pain Medicine Center serves patients in New York, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our state-of-the-art facility located in Manhattan's West Village neighborhood provides personalized care for individuals suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. With a team of board-certified physicians specializing in interventional pain management, we combine evidence-based treatments with compassionate care to help patients regain their quality of life.

At University Pain Medicine Center, we utilize advanced diagnostic techniques and innovative treatment approaches to address the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. Our multidisciplinary team develops customized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and complementary therapies. We specialize in treating conditions such as back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain.

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that pain affects every aspect of your life, which is why we take the time to listen to your concerns and thoroughly evaluate your condition. Our physicians work collaboratively with other healthcare providers to ensure coordinated care that addresses all factors contributing to your pain. We emphasize education and self-management strategies to empower patients in their healing journey.

Visit Our Manhattan Location

University Pain Medicine Center is conveniently located at 314 W 14th St, New York, NY 10014, United States. Our modern facility is equipped with the latest technology for diagnosis and treatment of pain conditions. To schedule a consultation with one of our pain specialists, please call +1 732-853-8475. We accept most major insurance plans and offer flexible appointment scheduling to accommodate our patients' needs.

Mount Sinai Beth Israel Pain Management serves patients throughout New York, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions. Located in the heart of Manhattan at Union Square, our specialized clinic combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. Our multidisciplinary team of board-certified physicians, pain specialists, and support staff work collaboratively to develop personalized treatment plans for each patient.

At Mount Sinai Beth Israel Pain Management, we utilize evidence-based approaches to treat a wide spectrum of pain disorders. Our specialists are trained in the latest interventional procedures, medication management protocols, and integrative therapies to provide relief for conditions including:

  • Chronic back and neck pain

  • Neuropathic pain syndromes

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Cancer-related pain

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

  • Arthritis and joint pain

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that pain affects every aspect of life, which is why our approach focuses on improving function and quality of life, not just managing symptoms. Our facility features state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment and treatment rooms designed for patient comfort and privacy. As part of the renowned Mount Sinai Health System, patients benefit from access to cutting-edge research and innovative treatment options.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us at +1 212-844-8751. Our clinic is conveniently located at 10 Union Square E, New York, NY 10003, with accessibility to multiple subway lines and bus routes. We accept most major insurance plans and work with patients to navigate coverage options for specialized treatments.

column40:
The hospital and care I received at  Mt. Sinai / Beth Israel Pain and Palliative Care Center was almost as good as the one I'm being treated at now with one major difference... location and parking.
Navigating to this location has always been a challenge, regardless of transportation. Whether driving or using public transit, I consistently faced delays and missed appointments due to the unpredictable travel times. These 50-60 minute trips often took 2-3 hours, significantly impacting my punctuality.

My doctor, Dr. Benjamin H. Natelson, has been incredibly understanding of my condition, which causes cognitive difficulties. He consistently accommodated my challenges, patiently waiting or rescheduling appointments. His support extended beyond simply waiting - he provided detailed, step-by-step directions over the phone and even personally escorted me to the correct subway entrance.

Dr. Natelson's dedication has been invaluable. I've been his patient since 1994, following him from UMDNJ in Newark to Mt. Sinai Beth Israel and now to their uptown location. This new location offers significantly improved accessibility, regardless of transportation method.

The availability of valet parking at Mt. Sinai is a major relief, eliminating the stress of finding parking and further minimizing the risk of late arrivals. This is especially beneficial after a long drive without any unforeseen delays.|The worst hospital ever. I schedule an appointment for pelvic ultrasound.I asked in advance how long is the wait time and was told there are 4 technicians so it will only take 15 minutes I also was told to come "ready" meaning with fool bladder. I had 8 glasses of water and was put on hold for an hour. When I said I CANT WAIT any longer I was told that it is my problem, they have 4 more people before me and cant do anything but I am welcome to complain. When I asked for a manager I was told  she/he is not available, so I left. Not only I had to take an extended lunch and didn't accomplish anything  and had to commute when its 95 F outside taking subway underground in this heat and spending $5 for nothing but waiting more than an hour after having 8 glasses of water was a torture!
The worst service ever! Stay away!!!!!|When in for x-rays to Mount Sinai 10 Union Square East to see Dr. Miyasaka for pain in my right knee that has been bothering me for the past three months. Kind, friendly and courteous staff. Dr. Miyasaka is very professional and quick.|This is a great place to go for practically any treatment and they accept virtually all types of insurance this is 1 of the best hospitals I've gone to.|Their computer systems are the worst ever from one doctor another doctor on the same floor right next to each other and the computer systems don't talk to each other pour aministration dealing with computer system.|one star||

column2: New York Interventional Pain Management Center
column3:
New York Interventional Pain Management Center serves Brooklyn, NY and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain management solutions. Established as a premier pain treatment facility, our center combines advanced interventional techniques with personalized care plans to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Our board-certified specialists utilize evidence-based approaches to help patients regain mobility and improve quality of life without excessive reliance on medication.

At our Brooklyn facility, we offer a wide range of interventional procedures including epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and joint injections. Our team specializes in treating conditions such as back pain, neck pain, arthritis, sciatica, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain. Each treatment plan is tailored to address the unique needs and circumstances of individual patients.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in a multidisciplinary approach to pain management that considers the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our physicians take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors before recommending appropriate interventions. This comprehensive assessment ensures that treatments are both effective and aligned with patients' overall health goals.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our modern clinic at 1664 E 14th St, Suite 3B in Brooklyn is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. The comfortable environment is designed to put patients at ease while receiving the highest standard of care. We maintain strict safety protocols and utilize the latest techniques to minimize risks and maximize treatment outcomes.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us at +1 347-763-9793. Additional information about our treatments and approach to pain management can be found on our website at www.painexpertdoc.com. Our dedicated staff is available to answer questions and assist with appointment scheduling.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Yaguda to anyone suffering from chronic pain. His expertise, compassionate care, and tailored treatment approach have made a significant positive impact on my life. If you're looking for a pain medicine doctor who truly cares about his patients, Dr. Yaguda is the one to see! Thank you, Dr. Yaguda, for your dedication and support! What stood out to me was Dr. Yaguda's commitment to follow-up care. He scheduled regular appointments to monitor my progress and adjust the treatment plan as needed. Each follow-up visit felt thorough; he would review my pain levels and any side effects I experienced from medications, making real-time adjustments to ensure optimal relief. His empathy and understanding of my struggles made a significant difference in my treatment journey.|I recently had treatment at the brand new Interventional Pain Management Center by Dr. Yaguda, and my experience was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I walked through the doors, I was greeted with kindness and professionalism by the entire staff. The environment is warm and welcoming, which immediately put me at ease.
Dr. Yaguda is truly outstanding. He took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly explained the treatment options available to me. His expertise in pain management is evident, and his compassionate approach made me feel confident and comfortable throughout the entire process. Dr. Yaguda's ability to tailor a treatment plan specifically for my needs has made a significant difference.
The care I received at the Interventional Pain Management Center was top-notch, from the initial consultation to the follow-up appointments. The team works seamlessly to ensure that every patient receives the best possible care. I am grateful to Dr. Yaguda and the entire staff for their dedication to improving their patients' lives.

Highly recommend Dr. Yaguda and the Interventional Pain Management Center to anyone seeking relief from chronic pain. Their expertise, compassion, and commitment to patient care are truly unparalleled.|I cannot speak highly enough about Dr. Boris Yaguda and the exceptional care I received for my chronic ankle pain. From the moment I walked into the office, I felt welcomed and reassured by the friendly and professional staff. Dr. Yaguda took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly evaluated my condition, demonstrating a deep understanding of pain management and ankle anatomy.
Dr. Yaguda crafted a comprehensive pain management plan tailored specifically to my needs, which included a combination of medication, physical therapy, and innovative procedures that provided immediate and long-lasting relief. Throughout the entire process, Dr. Yaguda was compassionate, patient, and always willing to answer any questions I had.
My ankle pain has significantly improved, allowing me to confidently and comfortably return to my daily activities.  I highly recommend Dr. Boris Yaguda to anyone seeking pain management care.|Dr. Yaguda is friendly, attentive, and very knowledgeable. I'm glad his new office is much closer to my home. His team is very professional and courteous.   Thank you all at
New York Interventional Pain Management Center.|Helped me with my back issues. I have seen many specialists in the NYC area for a specific lower back issue and Dr Yaguda specifically took the extra time to work on exercises so that pain will stay away for good hopefully. Decent doc, very straightforward.|Dr. Yaguda is a wonderful doctor. He is very knowledgeable, professional and has an excellent bedside manner. He takes time to listen to his patients and develops a comprehensive treatment plan. I highly recommend Dr. Yaguda to anyone looking for an expert pain management physician.|I am a patient of Dr Elena Ocher and had the pleasure of seeing Dr Boris Yaguda several times when Dr Ocher was doing a procedure in the OR. Being in the medical field (retired now and caring for my mum with 2nd Stage Dementia) for many, many years, I can personally attest to the professionalism and expertise of Dr Yaguda and Dr Ocher. Both are excellent practitioners in anesthesiology/pain management and I can say I have NEVER had a visit or a procedure performed in which I was mistreated or felt unwelcome by staff or surgeons. Dr Yaguda always is jolly and has a sweet smile on his face! Dr Ocher is the best, in my opinion. You can ask her any question about her treatment plan for you and makes sure you understand completely and agree with care!! Never had a problem with my medication either. I actually weaned myself off Percocet which I had used for several years because the injections and procedures I receive in the OR have helped tremendously! I do take Tylenol w/Codeine as needed and Lyrica. I feel awesome now! Thank you Dr Ocher, Dr Yaguda, Val, Katia, and front desk staff!!! Happy Holidays!|I was a patient with significant arm pain. Dr Yaguda has helped me tremendously and I will go back in an instant.  From reviewer below that rated with 1 star, I have never seen anything like this in the office and I know many patients who are extremely satisfied and never heard such  bad talk regarding my doctor.

column3:
Mila Mogilevsky, D.O. serves New York, NY as a distinguished pain management specialist dedicated to providing comprehensive care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. With her extensive training in osteopathic medicine, Dr. Mogilevsky takes a holistic approach to pain management, addressing not just symptoms but underlying causes to restore quality of life. Her practice combines evidence-based interventional procedures with integrative therapies, offering personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs.

At her practice located in the heart of Manhattan, Dr. Mogilevsky offers a wide range of advanced pain management solutions including joint injections, nerve blocks, spinal interventions, and regenerative medicine therapies. Her expertise extends to treating complex conditions such as back pain, neck pain, arthritis, neuropathy, sports injuries, and post-surgical pain. Patients appreciate her thorough diagnostic approach and commitment to finding effective, minimally invasive solutions before considering surgical options.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets Dr. Mogilevsky apart is her unwavering dedication to patient education and collaborative care. She takes time to explain conditions and treatment options in detail, ensuring patients are active participants in their healing journey. Her compassionate bedside manner and willingness to listen have earned her exceptional patient satisfaction ratings and numerous referrals from other healthcare providers throughout the NYC metropolitan area.

Practice Information

Dr. Mogilevsky welcomes new patients at her modern, comfortable office located at 369 Lexington Avenue, 19th Floor, New York, NY 10017. The practice accepts most major insurance plans and offers convenient scheduling options. For consultations or to learn more about available treatment options, patients can call +1 929-363-0303 or visit https://uniquepainmedicine.com/ to schedule an appointment online. The office is easily accessible by public transportation and is wheelchair accessible.

out of all the pain management doctors i have seen over the past 3 years, dr. mogilevsky is the best i've ever met! she is kind, attentive, and always willing to listen and find the most appropriate solution for my pain. i always walk out of her clinic feeling a million times better. she has helped me manage my chronic cervical and lumbar pain in ways that no other provider has been able to do for me. i have recommended her to all of my friends and family members and will continue to do so! thank you dr mogilevsky|I strongly recommend Dr. Mogilevsky and her office for anyone who requires care for chronic or acute musculoskeletal injuries.  I was fortunate to be referred to her by a doctor friend of mine. She took the time that was needed in order to determine exactly what type of treatment would be best for me.  Once she determined this, she explained her recommendations in detail.  I was comfortable with her treatment plan and can state without hesitation that the treatment I received was very helpful and was done with great care and attention.  I am not one to write reviews often, but I felt that Dr. Mogilevsky's skillset and compassionate approach was more than worthy of this review.  5 stars!|To say that Dr. Mogilevsky is an excellent doctor would be an understatement! I am so grateful to her! When my lower back went out and I couldn't feel my left foot I was sure that I would need extensive surgery. Luckily a family friend recommended her and when I saw her I knew I was in good hands! She gave me a shot in my back which wasn't painful and within minutes I started to feel better. She was warm and kind and extremely knowledgeable.|Dr. Mogilevsky and her team will always use the least invasive procedure possible. Most pain management doctors are just in it for the money, but this team is remarkable in how they care for the individual's well being and not just lining their own pockets. They have improved my quality of life 1000% and I highly recommend me. I'm very grateful to them. I should've been on a wheelchair and they helped me regain my strength and confidence.|Dr. M has been treating my grandmother for a few months, and I must say I've been very impressed with both the doctor and the staff every time I accompany her. Everyone is so professional and they treat us like family. She is SO patient and caring with my grandmother and that means the world to us. We've been searching for a pain management doc for a while and are so happy to have found Dr Mogilevsky.|I have been a patient of Dr Mila for couple of months now. I came in with a major issue in disc in the back. I couldnt move much, sitting hurt it was bad. But under her treatment, I was able to regain my original life. Dance and exercise. Dr Mila and her team of Dr's are friendly, answered all my questions very nicely and explained what I needed as well.
Always going to be a patient here! Best treatment ever.|After suffering with lower back pain for years and visiting countless specialists to no avail, I can finally say that I have found the perfect pain management doctor for me. Dr. Mogilevsky and her exceptional team team cured my back pain. Their compassion, attention, and priority to my problem made me feel so taken care of. I would recommend anyone suffering from pain to come see Dr. Mogilevsky and her team. Thank you Unique Pain Management for helping me return to the best version of myself!|I had no ideas doctors like Dr. Mogilevsky existed. She was attentive from the moment she entered the room, and quickly identified the source of my pain. After diagnostics, Dr. M performed the procedure we discussed same-day. I'm writing this review from work after my visit, sitting more comfortably than I have sat for months. I will be back to see Dr. M soon!

Rehabilitation Medicine Center of New York serves patients throughout New York City with comprehensive pain management solutions. Located in the heart of Manhattan's Financial District, our center has established itself as a premier destination for those suffering from debilitating acute and chronic pain conditions. Our multidisciplinary approach combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with personalized treatment plans to help patients regain mobility, reduce pain, and improve their quality of life.

At Rehabilitation Medicine Center of New York, we offer advanced diagnostic and therapeutic interventions for pain affecting various parts of the body. Our expertise extends to treating complex conditions including:

  • Neck and back pain

  • Shoulder, knee, and ankle injuries

  • Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy (RSD)/Complex Regional Pain Syndrome

  • Neuropathic pain disorders

  • Sports-related injuries

  • Post-surgical pain

Expert Medical Leadership

Under the direction of Dr. Jose F. Colon, MD, our center brings together a team of academically and clinically trained professionals, including sub-specialists in various pain management disciplines. Dr. Colon's commitment to evidence-based medicine and patient-centered care has established our practice as a trusted resource for patients seeking relief from persistent pain conditions.

Our Approach

We believe in developing comprehensive treatment strategies that address not only the symptoms but also the underlying causes of pain. Our interventional techniques are minimally invasive and designed to provide both immediate relief and long-term management of pain conditions, helping patients avoid unnecessary surgeries and reduce dependence on pain medications.

Visit Our Center

Rehabilitation Medicine Center of New York welcomes new patients at our conveniently located office in Lower Manhattan:

80 Maiden Lane, Suite 703

New York, NY 10038

Phone: +1 212-619-2610

Website: http://nycpain.com/

Contact us today to schedule a consultation and take the first step toward effective pain management and improved quality of life.
column11: Rehabilitation Medicine Center of New York offers exceptional interventional pain management solutions for acute and chronic pain affecting the body, including the neck, back, shoulders, knees, and ankles. We also specialize in treating Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy (RSD). Doctor Jose F. Colon, MD oversees a team of academically and clinically trained professionals, including sub-specialists.

I highly recommend Dr. Mark Galperin's pain management clinic. From the moment I walked in, I felt cared for and understood. Dr. Galperin took the time to listen to my concerns, thoroughly explained the treatment options , and went over everything without rushing me, which made me feel comfortable and confident in the plan we decided on. The treatment I received was very effective, and I've seen a remarkable improvement in my quality of life. If you're struggling with pain and want a doctor who genuinely cares, Dr. Galperin's clinic is the place to go!|I have been coming for therapy for the past year. I have had a fantastic experience. The staff has been excellent.  Ms Margarita has always been helpful and understanding to my condition. She has made my treatment a pleasant experience always. I recommend  this medical care to anyone. It has definitely earned my five stars.|They were pretty disorganized. I had to repeat my symptoms many times, and it led to not getting the care I needed. The physical therapist was very rude because of my speaking up about symptoms I had and requesting to get physical therapy that aligned with what an orthopedist prescribed. Not only was she rude and short, but she was also rough with me - an injured person. I ended up with a scratch on my back. Not returning.|Rehab Medicine Center of NYC has saved my life.. I've been a patient now for over 15 years being extremely lucky to have such amazing Doctors.... Dr Colon has been most dedicated Doctor I have ever had.. I was sad when he retired but got lucky w another fantastic Doctor.. Dr Edwin Perez is most knowledgeable Dr when it comes to pain management.. He is amazing @ trigger point injections, Botox for pain, Epidurals & Explains it all to you .. He has helped me so much that he has taken away like 70% of my pain. This is by far best pain management group who cater to all.. Milton & Margarita are also 2 amazing Physical Therapists... Dr Perez is most knowledgeable when it comes to pain .. He knows & gets it.. Grateful to have him as my Doctor.|Love this office! The staff is super friendly, compassionate and helpful. The office is clean and organized. Also, the wait time is not long compare to other offices I've been to where I'd had to wait for hours!|Receptionists are nice but totally incompetent. I started contacting them in July. Initial contact was professional & quite pleasant. Now it's Dec., my MRI is NOT in. I had to personally hand over these files. I made appointment to get a procedure. No one told me that it's in NJ (where they can charge more). MRI in NY -> no one sent the necessary paper work to Lenox hill => No MRI. I showed up the office. Waited for 2 hours to be picked up. Dr. Perez cancels the procedure as he is out of time.  WTF? Complete incoordination.
I made an appointment for Thurs Dec 12. No one calls me prior. So, I called back. After 3 phone calls, the reps propose 13th. Here we are on 12th 6PM & no one calls me to arrange. I call & the reps are saying that the calls are late until 7PM. Complete break down.  DO NOT HAVE IT TOGETHER. Hey, the receptionists are nice but DO NOT COVER their incompetence. GET IT TOGETHER.|The receptionists are so nice! But I've been waiting for an hour and 15 minutes and there's still 4 patients ahead of me to see the dr. I asked if this was normal and they said unfortunately it is.

Updating my prior 1 star, I saw dr simely after 2 hours and he was so lovely I couldn't really be mad. But definitely do expect a crazy wait|They have very unprofessional and unreliable staff, they are untrustworthy, when they made a mistake, they don't think twice about lying.  So I deeply recommend that if you are planning to get some results, go somewhere else.  I was not the type of person that rely on reviews, but trust me on this one, i hope that every person that have an awful experience, take the time to express it.  I am not going into details.  It is horrible to try to manage your pain, after an accident and then be involve with people that should not be working around this kind of business.  I feel sorry about these doctors that do not have a clue of the people that are running their office....

column2: Empire Minimally Invasive Spine and Pain of New York
column3:
Empire Minimally Invasive Spine and Pain of New York serves the greater New York City area with exceptional pain management solutions. Our board-certified physicians combine advanced medical expertise with compassionate care to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. We understand that pain affects every aspect of your life, which is why our team is dedicated to developing personalized treatment plans that target the root cause of your discomfort rather than just masking symptoms.

Our Pain Management Doctors NYC offer a multidisciplinary approach to treating various pain conditions. Through thorough evaluations and advanced diagnostic testing, we identify the underlying causes of your pain to develop targeted treatment strategies. Our specialists utilize cutting-edge techniques and evidence-based practices to provide relief while improving your overall quality of life.

Specialized Treatment Options

We provide a range of minimally invasive procedures designed to minimize recovery time and maximize results. Our treatments include:

- Interventional pain procedures

- Spine injections

- Nerve blocks

- Radiofrequency ablation

- Advanced medication management

- Physical therapy coordination

Patient-Centered Approach

At Empire Minimally Invasive Spine and Pain, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the condition. Each treatment plan is tailored to address your specific needs, goals, and lifestyle factors. Our compassionate team works closely with you throughout your treatment journey, adjusting approaches as needed to ensure optimal outcomes.

Visit Our NYC Pain Management Specialists

If you're struggling with pain that affects your daily activities and quality of life, contact our experienced team today. Schedule your consultation at our convenient Manhattan location.

Address: 800 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10017, United States

Phone: +1 516-229-1443

Website: [https://empirespineandpain.com](https://empirespineandpain.com/?ysource=1MTAwMDM0MDc1Ni03MTUtbG9jYXRpb24ud2Vic2l0ZQ%3D%3D)

Pain Management Doctors NYC provides personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs. They begin by conducting thorough evaluations and diagnostic tests to identify the underlying causes of the pain. This allows them to develop an accurate diagnosis and understanding of the condition.

column40:
I was referred to Dr. Akhnoukh back in 2020. My lower back was just a mess having been an xray tech since the seventies. Herniations, spinal stenosis, etc. Anti-inflammatory meds always bothered my stomach & were no longer working. So chronic back pain was a part of life I couldn't fix! Until I went to Dr. Akhnoukh & his expertise in various treatments have changed my life! I get RFA ( radio frequency ablation) & I was pain & medication free for 2yrs. Too long to explain but so worth checking into. I've repeated that procedure again & I've recommended family & friends bc I am so grateful!. He is knowledgeable, kind & caring. The office staff is also very pleasant to deal with!|From the moment I arrived for my procedure, I was treated with a very courteous, respectful, caring and professional staff. From the front desk staff to the nursing staff that prepped me for the procedure to the staff inside the procedure room, all were kind and attentive and made me feel comfortable and I was confident I was in good hands. I especially wanted to point out that Dr. Akhnoukh was exceptional in keeping me informed of what I should expect inside the procedure room and throughout the procedure. He is a kind, respectful doctor and his skills and professionalism is second to none!|I have been to visit Dr. Akhnoukh on several occasions with a diagnosed spinal cord compression.  I had previously
consulted with a neurosurgeon and an orthopedic, both of whom suggested surgery.  Dr. Akhnoukh saw me and I had 3 epidurals and 1 nerve block starting last January 2023 and continued physical therapy.   I am currently pain free and functional.  I have recommended Dr. Akhnoukh to several people and would not hesitate to do so again.  He is compassionate, competent and easy to communicate with.  His office manager, Hillary, is also an asset to the practice.|Dr.Akhnoukh is the best. He takes his time to listen to your concerns and gives you multiple options for your treatment and you both decide what is best for you. It is a pleasure seeing a doctor that takes his time and does not make you feel like you're in a revolving door situation. Def recommend him for pain Management  treatment .|The doctor have a heart, what I mean is that he really take time to listen to your concerns and respond appropriately. Sometimes I felt like my questions wasn't clear enough for him to understand what I needed to convey but he acknowledged my concern and validated my complains. Back pain have changed my life  and I don't like taking medications, but I am glad this doctor is equal to a challenging patient like me.  He is highly recommended.|Staff is very polite and accommodating.  Dr Aknoukh is very nice and always assuring me that everything will be fine and it always is.
Thank you Dr Aknoukh for making me feel so comfortable.|Injecting some meds into your neck is never fun.  But everyone was so nice.  My neck feels better at some level|

column3:
Advanced Spine & Pain on Park Avenue serves New York, NY with exceptional pain management services under the leadership of renowned specialist Dr. Sudhir A. Diwan, MD. Located in the heart of Manhattan, our practice delivers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions using innovative techniques and personalized treatment plans. Our state-of-the-art facility on East 57th Street combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to help patients regain their quality of life.

Dr. Diwan is nationally and internationally recognized as a key opinion leader in pain management, having been published extensively in prestigious medical publications. With his exceptional training and decades of experience, Dr. Diwan has established himself as one of New York's premier pain specialists. His approach combines evidence-based medicine with innovative techniques to address even the most challenging pain conditions.

After completing his Residency in Anesthesiology at St. Luke's Roosevelt Hospital of Columbia University, Dr. Diwan further specialized through a fellowship in pain management at NewYork Presbyterian Hospital of Cornell University. This elite training has equipped him with the expertise to handle complex cases that other specialists may find difficult to treat effectively.

Specialized Treatment Areas

Dr. Diwan is well-known for treating the most complex and challenging cases of chronic pain. His expertise encompasses a wide range of conditions, including:

  • Chronic pain syndromes

  • Neuropathic pain syndromes

  • Complex regional pain syndromes

  • Postherpetic neuralgia

  • Chest wall pain syndromes

  • Back pain and neck pain

  • Failed back surgery syndrome

  • Cancer-related pain syndromes

Our Approach to Pain Management

At Advanced Spine & Pain on Park Avenue, we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of a patient's life. Our comprehensive approach focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. We utilize advanced diagnostic techniques and develop customized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and innovative interventional techniques.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Diwan and take the first step toward effective pain relief, please contact us at:

Phone: +1 212-535-3505

Address: 115 E 57th St, Suite 610, New York, NY 10022

Website: www.advancedspinepainonparkavenue.com
column11:
Dr. Diwan is nationally and internationally recognized as a key opinion leader in pain management being published extensively in prestigious medical publications.

Dr. Diwan is well-known for treating the most complex and challenging cases of chronic pain. Among the types of conditions he most frequently encounters are chronic pain syndromes, neuropathic pain syndromes, complex regional pain syndromes, postherpetic neuralgia, chest wall pain syndromes, back pain, neck pain, failed back surgery syndrome, and cancer related pain syndromes. Dr. Diwan completed his Residency in Anesthesiology at St. Luke's Roosevelt Hospital of Columbia University and fellowship in pain management at NewYork Presbyterian Hospital of Cornell University.

column40: I am really sorry I can only give Dr. Diwan 5 stars because he deserves at least 10! He is an extraordinary doctor and I cannot praise his warmth, his caring, his professionalism and the time he has taken to answer all my questions enough. He never hurries me when I am in the office. I trust him completely and have complete confidence when he suggests a new treatment. There is absolutely no other pain management doctor I would consider seeing!! (It doesn't hurt that he has a great sense of humor also!) To make it short, I love this man!!!!|Dr Sudhir Diwan is the absolute best! From his diagnosis to the treatment was beyond our expectations, He is truly a God Sent ! He helped my husband after being in so much pain . His staff are excellent, Tyler who works with him as well. It is so well worth traveling to Dr Diwan  we would never go anywhere else now.. If you are looking to get the best you need to see Dr Diwan ..|As a patient  of Dr. Diwan's for many year's I've received  nothing  but the best treatments with both medical treatments and in always  providing me  information on each and every option I've ever inquired about , he has always put my health as a top priority and in doing so Dr . Diwan has helped elevate a lot of my physical  discomforts I was having  ,he recently did a spinal stimulation implant and he's been on top of my every step of recovery and if any concerns he addresses it IMMEDIATELY with no hesitations,  i will be a patient  of Dr. Diwan till he retires . He's truly a great  man ,THANK YOU|Dr. Diwan was my pain management Dr. after my L5S1 herniated disk surgery with Dr. Theodore Schwartz many years ago.  Dr. Diwan's expertise, knowledge and experience is beyond words.  He is a gentleman, he walks you through each step during a Medial Branch Nerve Block so you are aware when he is ready to begin the injection procedure.  I am now living in another state but would fly to NYC just to see him.  He is very caring and you know you are in good hands.  Terry|I've been with Dr. Diwan for almost 17 years from when I first got injured.   He is always willing to take the time to listen and try and come up with the best plan to take(and fight with the insurance).  I have had epidurals, radio frequency, nerve blocks to help with the pain.  Some working better then others due to my complex injury.  We put a spinal cord stimulator for my neck pain back in 2009.  That was life changing as far as cutting out a huge amount of my medications.  Medications wise Dr Diwan has always been attentive to my needs but never willing to just hand out pills.  He's always looking to deal with things interventionally if possible and keep the meds to amount.  Dr Diwan and his staff are top notch and have become like and extended family.   I always recommend him to whoever needs help with their pain.|I have been a patient of Dr. Diwan for the past 2 years. During this time he has been innovative, caring and tireless about my care & health. I have made great strides and look forward to my recovery getting to a 100 percent under his care.|I've been a patient of Dr. Diwan for almost 20 years. He reduced my pain from a severe case of endometriosis with adenomyosis, combined with a compressed disc,  when other doctors and surgeons had no success. I was being given an assortment of pain meds but with little instruction on use. Dr. Diwan helped me reduce my pain with fewer and safer medicines. He keeps ahead of new studies/ideas/strategies/medicines and ensures that his patients can continue to safely keep up with their careers, family and social lives, and live a life in control of pain. When pain controls you, your abilities are limited.  I'm very grateful to Dr. Diwan for allowing me to control my pain and keep active!|Dr Diwan gave me my life back! With crippling sciatic nerve damage, the constant pain was unbearable. I didn't want to be on powerful pain killers forever. With Dr Diwan's care I have not taken any pain medication for 7 years!

column3:
New York Pain Care serves Uptown NYC with specialized pain management solutions for residents suffering from acute and chronic conditions. The other comments here with 1 star reviews are pretty accurate, to boot. Look somewhere else. Anywhere else but Columbia.|Had an appointment scheduled weeks in advance. Not comfortable with how they deal with patients. Badly ran operations.|I was referred to Dr. Weinberger by another pain management doctor who told me that I need to go here because my problem was unusual and Dr. Weinberger might be able to help because he has seen more cases.  This doctor was completely useless. I spent more time with the interns who seemed genuinely interested.  When the doctor came in he offered no solutions and barely seemed interested.  On top of his lack of interest I received a bill for $400 for the drug screening that is done by a lab out of network.  I feel like ColumbiaDoctors is a brand and that's all.  Like a Chinese knockoff. Quality medical care is a thing of the past.  There is no benefit I was hoping they would at least confer with other doctors to try and solve my problem but I don't feel like they care once your 10 minutes is up.|Had what was meant to be a diagnostic procedure (spinal chord epidural) for my chronic pain. Terrible patient treatment, front desk kept pushing my call return time back, and bad results.|Dr. Matthews I have fought with to give me some pain medicine for the last year and a half. Led by Dr. Fady Wassef, our practice delivers comprehensive interventional treatments for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. His multilingual capabilities—fluent in Spanish, Arabic, and French—ensure clear communication with our diverse patient population. This linguistic versatility allows Dr. Wassef to thoroughly understand each patient's pain experience and explain treatment options with clarity and compassion.

Specialized Treatment Approaches

Each treatment plan is customized to address the unique needs of the individual patient, focusing on both immediate pain relief and long-term functional improvement.

column48: How Do I File a Workers' Compensation Claim?
column49:
Filing a workers' compensation claim as soon as possible is important. Report a workplace injury or illness if:

The injured person is an employee of your business.
Your employee became sick due to their work.
The employee gets injured because of job-related duties.
If the employee gets hurt in the workplace.
Make sure your employee gets the proper medical treatment if they're injured on the job. If you need to, call the ambulance or take them to the emergency room. If their recovery requires time off from work, approve their request.

This place is terrible. First I waited 20 minutes for my appointment. Then the doctor took a call during my appointment. Super unprofessional. After my test results came back, instead of calling me and telling me, the doctor went on vacation (days after he had the results) and I had to wait a week to hear back from them. Had to call them multiple times to get answers. It takes multiple phone calls to them to actually get anything done. Highly recommend not going here.|Dr. Kim is wonderful, he listens and lays out all your options! His treatment plan helped improve my mobility and independence tremendously. However there are several communication issues within the practice that have resulted in my delayed care and regression.

When I questioned the staff about my need for help, they apologized and said that they didn't really know what to do because it is not a situation they handle often.

When I reach out to the front staff, they never seem to understand what I need although I've spoken to the same person (Diandra) numerous times. She is continuously unprofessional and lacks any empathy towards my situation always placing blame on the doctor, other departments and insurance carrier. It seems the manager's never available. Unfortunately, the one person(Laryssa) that seems to know what is going on is in the billing department and so swapped with other cases that she forgets what our conversations entailed when I call to follow up.

Highly disappointed and upset that I am falling through the cracks because they cannot do their part in following through and communicating.|Dr. Kim and his entire staff are extremely caring, concerned and responsive. The best medical practice I have ever encountered.||

Seth A. Waldman, MD serves the New York, NY area as a distinguished pain management specialist dedicated to helping patients find relief from chronic and acute pain conditions. Based at the prestigious Hospital for Special Surgery (HSS), Dr. Waldman combines evidence-based treatments with compassionate care to address a wide range of orthopedic and neurologic pain disorders.

As the Director of the Pain Management Division at HSS, Dr. Waldman has established himself as a leader in the field of non-operative pain management. His practice focuses exclusively on comprehensive evaluation and innovative treatment approaches for patients suffering from various pain conditions. With years of specialized experience, Dr. Waldman develops personalized treatment plans that aim to improve function and quality of life while minimizing reliance on medication.

Specialized Services

Dr. Waldman's expertise encompasses a broad spectrum of pain management techniques, including:

- Diagnostic evaluations for complex pain conditions

- Interventional pain procedures

- Non-surgical management of spine disorders

- Treatment for sports-related injuries

- Comprehensive approaches to neurologic pain

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Dr. Waldman's practice is his commitment to understanding each patient's unique pain experience. He takes time to listen to patients' concerns, thoroughly evaluate their conditions, and develop targeted treatment strategies that address both symptoms and underlying causes.

column40:
Dr Seth Waldman is an amazing pain management doctor and physiatrist. I came to him with lower back pain. He took his time to clearly explain my problem, the possible courses of treatment, and benefits/risks of choosing different approaches. He answered all my questions thoroughly and thoughtfully, with a great deal of respect for patient autonomy and input. Even though I ultimately needed surgery to address my problem, Dr Waldman gave it his all to solve my problem with the tools he has as a physiatrist. I highly recommend him for his diagnostic skills and his technical expertise.|I came to see Dr. Waldman from NJ after I started having right sided lower back pain. Dr. Walkman knew that my significant other and I are medical professionals and he still sat with us for over 30 minutes to explain the details of the entire MRI while showing us exactly what he saw and what his concerns were. He was exceptionally thorough and professional. He offered me options for treatment and considered my goals for rehabilitation. His fellow was also very thorough, friendly, and professional.|One epidural reduced my back pain by 90%. I was skeptical at first because I've have multiple epidurals in the past from other doctors that offered zero relief. Dr Waldman is a great doctor and really nice guy as well. He really cares about his patients.|I was lucky enough to be treated by Dr. Waldman and his staff. He is professional, kind, courteous and he is very very intelligent. I traveled 45 minutes to see him. He took the time to thoroughly examine me and listen to my history. He spent about an hour with me the first time I met him. Dr. Waldman eventually performed a radio frequency ablation on my lumbar area of my back. He and his staff were also very knowledgeable about what was required by my insurance company to get it all accomplished. I am so grateful for Dr. Waldman and HSS.|Dr. Waldman is God-sent! He doesn't prescribe narcotics routinely, if that's what you're looking for as a bandaid for your pain. He takes a detailed history, listens intently to what his patients have to say, orders the appropriate tests, shows you the results and discusses at length treatment options. If something doesn't work, he has a back up plan. He doesn't rush into surgery either, unless all options are exhausted. He's a gentle and caring soul who clearly has devoted his life to making back pain more manageable. I've been seeing him for over three years and have a very complex case and I recommend him highly.|I don't have enough words to describe how happy I am after I met Dr Seth Waldman.  I had 2 other Pain Mgmt Drs before him and was very disappointed.  I travel every month to see him to NYC and it worth it since no other Dr like him.  He spends as much time as I need to answer all my questions, to explain all I need to know and always finds words of encouragement.  Not easy to have a patient who survived 2 serious spinal fusions, struggles with pain 24/7 and has many complications and nerve damages.  But in 6 years I never heard from him "Nothing can be done", he always finds a solution to help me and I am very grateful for that.  I recommend him to everyone who needs a good PM Dr; I promise you will not  regret.
L.V.|My husband was petrified at the thought of caudal injection. Dr. Waldman met with us, calming educated us to the procedure. My husband's anxiety diminished  and had a successful caudel injection.  P Nichols|The most unbelievably kind , patient and effective pain management Dr  one could have. His staff is warm and helpful in reducing anxiety.I have found his office staff to be very responsible in collaborating with my other HSS Drs and getting back to me ASAP.

Our team specializes in treating conditions such as back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, complex regional pain syndrome, and pain resulting from workplace injuries or automobile accidents.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in creating collaborative relationships with our patients, taking time to understand how pain affects their daily activities and developing strategies that address both the symptoms and underlying causes. Our compassionate staff guides patients through every step of their treatment journey, ensuring they have the support and education needed to participate actively in their recovery process.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management experts, call us at (919) 751-8444. You can also learn more about our services by visiting our website at www.erpsnc.com. Eastern Regional Pain Specialists is committed to helping patients reclaim their lives from chronic pain through evidence-based treatments and personalized care plans.

column40:
This was my first appointment, and I saw Tiffani Hoefer, PA. I found her to be extremely thorough; she listened very well; she was very friendly and down to earth; and she  outlined several different options for my treatment plan. I liked that she wasn't pushy about any of them and allowed me to be able to participate in my care too. I felt the direction she going with me was reasonable, regardless of the particular path we choose.

The nurse, Brittney, was equally as thorough and friendly as my provider, and so were the receptionists. I felt very comfortable at this office, and I felt like a person to my provider, the nurse and the receptionist.

As for the clinic, itself, parking was adequate and easily accessible. The clinic is Lin a convenient location. Inside, the reception area was neat and clean, although the chairs in the waiting area could've been a bit more comfortable, but the wait time was very brief, so it wasn't really that big of a deal. The rest room was also very neat and clean, as well as the patient rooms.

Overall, the first visit left a very good impression and I'd highly recommend this clinic and this provider.|Alison Thomas is very compassionate and kind. Of the many kinds of physicians I have dealt with, she and her clinic actually listen and is very supportive and understanding of my many physical issues and needs. I'm always greeted with a smile, concern, and patience. I feel that I am heard, I am truly cared for. I hate the way I feel regarding my condition , but their approach and their care bring a ray of sunshine to my day. I have never left there feeling that they were not in my corner. I see Allison, Alissa, Dr McCall , and they are always professional and honest and they always seem to be happy. I cannot say anything but positive about Eastern Regional Pain Clinic in Goldsboro, NC and their staff.|Friendly staff and they always make sure that I have what I need! The wait time is always short usually not more than 15 minutes! They listen to what I have going on and do their best to help me have a better quality of life! I am very satisfied with this medical profession!|Physician's, PA, nurses and staff have all been great to work with, especially Allison.  She takes the time to listen, explain and address any concerns or issues.  A true professional.  Highly recommend them if you need top notch care!|Allison was very professional and caring. She was very pleased with the response and relief of pain I received from my injection. I am totally pleased with this practice and all staff.|Absolutely wonderful. I felt like y'all really want to help and I felt like you were happy to help me. Michelle is the best!! She was very personal and professional!!! I will not go anywhere else with my issue....|I have to say Michelle Fleck, FNP is an amazing individual.  Not only does she listen to my concerns and feelings she hears what you say. There is never a rush to get you out. Greatly satisfied with my experience here. Would recommend to anyone experiencing pain and discomfort. Five Stars!!!!|Allison Thomas NP is awesome!!! I've been going to other pain clinics for probably 10 years now and she is the first provider that I feel really listened to me. After only 2 months, we have a treatment plan that has been successful. Not only is she a good NP , she's one of the nicest and sweetest people you'll ever meet. From the front desk to the clinical staff best medical environment around. Finally found the help I've been searching for !!

Pain Clinic of North Carolina serves Shelby, NC and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of specialists combines advanced medical expertise with compassionate care to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Established as a trusted healthcare provider in the region, we've built our reputation on personalized treatment plans that focus on both pain relief and functional improvement, helping patients reclaim their quality of life.

At the Pain Clinic of North Carolina, we understand that pain affects every aspect of your life. Our multidisciplinary approach integrates various treatment modalities to effectively diagnose and treat painful medical injuries and conditions. We specialize in addressing complex pain issues including back and neck pain, joint disorders, neuropathic pain, and post-surgical discomfort.

Our Collaborative Approach

What sets us apart is our team-based methodology. Our providers work collaboratively to ensure each patient receives the highest quality medical and rehabilitative services available in North Carolina. This integrated approach allows us to develop customized treatment plans that may include interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and behavioral health strategies.

Patient-Centered Care

We prioritize patient education and involvement in the treatment process. Our goal extends beyond pain management—we aim to improve overall function and enhance your ability to engage in daily activities. Each treatment plan is tailored to address your specific needs, with regular assessments to track progress and adjust approaches as needed.

Visit Our Shelby Location

Our conveniently located facility at 417 W Warren St, Shelby, NC 28150 offers a comfortable environment for your pain management needs. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, call us at +1 704-481-0171 or visit our website at https://www.ncpaincare.com/locations/shelby/.

My records were never sent, had to take another trip for X-rays, then return two more weeks later, had a came at the wrong time, they would not see me even tho they were empty and I drove 45 mins to get there, said I was a walk in first time, I'm pretty sure the insurance was billed for the previous visit. I was under the impression that it was a place for drug abuse and that I would be treated as an abuser, even though I had just begun my treatment. I was so wrong !! I saw a very friendly staff, a very understanding staff and not once was I treated with less respect or less dignity than any other Clinic I've been to, Eye, Dental, Ear etc..
My impression was so off base, I hope anyone who needs help with medication after an injury or surgery understands the importance of the Clinic. Your health care is important and this process is not to shame anyone who takes pain medication, it's to control the quantity of medication that not only you might be able to achieve but to also control the influx of medication that does hit the streets.
The Pain Clinic, is at most, Safety first in your care.

Premier Pain Solutions serves patients across North Carolina and South Carolina with dedicated pain management services. With a commitment to compassionate care, our medical team specializes in minimally invasive treatments designed to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. We've established multiple locations throughout the region to ensure accessible care for all our patients, with offices in Asheville, Columbus, Greenville, and Wilmington, North Carolina, as well as Easley and Greenville, South Carolina.

At Premier Pain Solutions, we understand that pain affects each person differently. Our specialists are trained to diagnose and treat a wide spectrum of pain conditions, including arthritis, back pain, cancer pain, fibromyalgia, and debilitating migraines. Rather than offering one-size-fits-all solutions, we develop personalized treatment plans that address your specific symptoms, medical history, and lifestyle needs.

Patient-Centered Approach

column3:
Carolinas Pain Institute serves Winston-Salem, NC and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of chronic, acute, and cancer pain, our team of specialists employs a multidisciplinary approach to help patients regain control of their lives. We understand that pain affects every aspect of daily living, which is why we offer personalized treatment plans tailored to each individual's unique needs and circumstances.

At Carolinas Pain Institute, we recognize that medication alone may not be sufficient to manage certain types of pain. Our integrated approach includes the latest advances in pharmacology, physiotherapy, and cognitive and interventional therapy. By combining various treatment modalities, we can address pain from multiple angles, providing more effective relief than single-method approaches. Our interventional procedures are performed by board-certified specialists using state-of-the-art equipment in a comfortable, supportive environment.

Advanced Treatment Options

Our practice offers access to cutting-edge pain management techniques that may not be available elsewhere. Through our affiliation with the Center for Clinical Research, patients have opportunities to participate in national clinical trials of emerging treatments. Additionally, our partnership with PainPathways Magazine provides valuable support and educational resources to help patients better understand and manage their conditions.

Patient-Centered Care

Located at 145 Kimel Park Dr #330 in Winston-Salem, NC, our facility is designed with patient comfort in mind. We believe in empowering our patients through education and involvement in their treatment decisions. Our team takes the time to listen to concerns, answer questions, and develop comprehensive treatment plans that address both the physical and emotional aspects of living with pain.

For more information or to schedule a consultation, call us at (336) 765-6181 or visit our website at https://carolinaspaininstitute.com/.
column11: Carolinas Pain Institute is dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of chronic, acute, and cancer pain. We offer the latest advances in pharmacology, physiotherapy, and cognitive and interventional therapy, access to national clinical trials through the Center for Clinical Research, and support and educational resources through our partnership with PainPathways Magazine. Medication alone may not be enough to manage certain kinds of pain. Some medicines are more effective in fighting pain when they are combined with other methods of treatment. In some cases, the patient's pain condition may respond to treatment instead of medication.
